entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Attawapiskat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:27 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -32.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Attawapiskat Airport 05:00 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

Temperature: -32.9°C
Pressure: 102.9 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -42
Dewpoint: -36.4°C
Wind: WSW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this morning. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
